author: BenjaminRS
body:
#### PR description:

<!-- Please replace this text with a description of the feature proposed or problem addressed, specifying:
  - what changes are expected in the output if any, 
  - what other PRs or externals it depends upon if any,
  - link to any additional material useful to provide a documentation for this PR (slides, JIRA tickets, related pull requestes, hypernews, TWiki or Indico pages)  -->

This PR holds the E2E NNVtx code for P2 L1T Primary Vertex Reconstruction. The work has been presented many times over the years including in:
https://cds.cern.ch/record/2792619?ln=en
https://cds.cern.ch/record/2814727?ln=en
And most recently: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1356822/#58-update-on-e2e-nnvtx

The L1T Integration branch version is here: https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1216
The model files needed by this NN are in the following PRs: https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-VertexFinder/pull/1 and https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TTrackMatch/pull/1 


#### PR validation:

Previously under https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1191 the following validations were performed:
This PR passes the following checks:
scram b
scram b code-format
scram b code-checks
scram b runtests
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos
time cmsRun L1Trigger/L1TTrackMatch/test/L1TrackObjectNtupleMaker_cfg.py
title: E2E NNVtx: A Phase 2 L1T Vertexing algorithm using End to End NN
